text:
Upright Labs | Frontend Engineer | Washington, DC | ONSITE | Full-Time | $90-120k+

Upright Labs builds multichannel ecommerce software for retailers. We make it really easy for retailers to sell online, everywhere. Our software processes thousands of items each month and has helped retailers sell 5m in inventory. We are looking for talented frontend engineers with great product sense. We are a team of 5 and growing quickly, hoping to get to 7 by end of year. Our stack is rails on the backend, all react on the frontend. Goal for this quarter is to start working in typescript into our stack!

Feel free to reach out directly to me at jackson at uprightlabs dot com
